                throws NEException
        Loads an external module from the 'modules' folder to be used in the zone.
        Parameters:

        classPath - The path to the class File that is the start of the module.

        NEException

      • addRoom

        public void addRoom(Room room)
             throws NERoomExistsException,
                    NEMaxRoomLimitException
        Adds a room to the zone.
        Parameters:
        room - The room.
        Throws:
        NEException - Room already exists in zone.
        NERoomExistsException
        NEMaxRoomLimitException

      • removeRoom

        public void removeRoom(Room room)
                throws NERoomDoesNotExistException,
                       NECanNotDeleteRoomException
        Removes a room from the zone.
        Parameters:
        room - The room to remove.
        Throws:
        NERoomDoesNotExistException - Room does not exist in the zone.
        NECanNotDeleteRoomException - Room is not dynamic and therefore can not be deleted. Can be changed in RoomSettings.

      • callEvent

        public void callEvent(User user,
             Packet packet)
        Calls the module event handler and room event handlers when a new packet is received.
        Parameters:
        user - The user the event came from.
        packet - The packet that was sent.

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
             throws NEGuestsNotAllowedException,
                    NEMaxUserLimitException,
                    NEAlreadyInUserManagerException
        Description copied from interface: IUserController
        Adds a user to the user manager.
        Specified by:
        addUser in interface IUserController
        Parameters:
        user - The user to add.
        Throws:
        NEGuestsNotAllowedException - User is a guest and can't be added to room. Can be changed in RoomSettings.
        NEMaxUserLimitException - Room or zone is full.
        NEAlreadyInUserManagerException - User already exists in user manager.

      • removeUser

        Description copied from interface: IUserController
